items.title: GiveCard Collaborates with Visa to Modernize Disbursements in the Public Sector
items.description: NEW YORK, June 25, 2025--GiveCard, a platform purpose-built to help nonprofits and government agencies disburse and manage funds over prepaid funds, today announced a strategic collaboration with Visa. GiveCard will be issuing virtual and physical prepaid cards to recipients, distributing them directly to recipients through various U.S. government agencies.
